title: 关于我
content: 🐾 关于我的两三事 南京大学自动化专业大二学生（机器人方向🤖）， 既是单机游戏终极发烧友 🎮（沉迷饥荒无法自拔）， 也是个喜欢折腾各种技术的成长型开发者。 .timeline { position: relative; max-width: 800px; margin: 2rem auto; padding: 0 1rem; } .timeline::before { content: ''; position: absolute; left: 50%; width: 4px; height: 100%; background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #a8edea 0%, #fed6e3 100%); transform: translateX(-50%); } .timeline-item { position: relative; width: calc(50% - 40px); padding: 20px; background: rgba(255,255,255,0.9); border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.08); backdrop-filter: blur(6px); margin: 30px 0; transition: transform 0.3s ease; } .timeline-item:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); } .timeline-item:nth-child(odd) { left: 0; } .timeline-item:nth-child(even) { left: calc(50% + 40px); } .timeline-year { position: absolute; top: -15px; width: 60px; height: 60px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-weight: bold; color: white; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%); box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(118,75,162,0.3);
